error: Assuming threads have separate memory spaces.
clarification: Threads share the process's memory space but have their own stack and registers.

error: Believing deadlock and starvation are the same thing.
clarification: Deadlock is a permanent blocking state; starvation is indefinite postponement without blocking.

error: Thinking FIFO scheduling is the same as Round Robin.
clarification: FIFO is non-preemptive; Round Robin uses time slices for preemption.

error: Believing page size affects logical address space directly.
clarification: Page size determines frame size; logical address space is independent.

error: Confusing virtual memory with physical memory.
clarification: Virtual memory allows larger address spaces via paging; physical is actual RAM.
